sentences.en: Canard wing increases lift coefficient with the penalty of the increase of drag coefficient.
sentences.cn: 低于主机翼的鸭翼将加强前掠翼布局的缓失速特性.

sentences.en: The charge that Harding was a political stooge may be a canard.
sentences.cn: 关于哈丁是个政治走狗的指控可能是个谣传。

sentences.en: The story itself was a canard deliberately invented by the Armenians.
sentences.cn: 这个传闻本身就是亚美尼亚人有意虚构的谎报.

sentences.en: This canard was started by William Herndon.
sentences.cn: 这一谣言最初出自威廉·赫恩登之口.

sentences.en: We remove these rear controls and install them as canard controls.
sentences.cn: 我们把尾部控制改为鸭式控制.

sentences.en: Who said that I got married, that is a canard.
sentences.cn: 谁说我结婚了, 那是个谣传.

trans.tran_en: A canard is an idea or a piece of information that is false, especially one that is spread deliberately in order to harm someone or their work
